name: Gemini Direct ✨
description: Get answers from Gemini AI directly in your Ulauncher window.

preferences.name: Primary Keyword
preferences.description: The keyword to trigger the extension (e.g., gm)

preferences.name: Alternative Keyword
preferences.description: Optional secondary keyword (useful for non-Latin keyboards)

preferences.name: Gemini API Key
preferences.description: Required. Get from Google AI Studio (aistudio.google.com/apikey)

preferences.name: Model
preferences.description: Select the Gemini model to use

preferences.name: Custom Model
preferences.description: Enter a specific model name (e.g., models/gemini-1.5-pro). Overrides above selection.

preferences.name: Prompt Context (Optional)
preferences.description: Add instructions/background to guide responses (tone, audience etc.)

preferences.name: Text Wrap Width (Characters)
preferences.description: Max characters per line in the displayed answer.

preferences.name: Wide Script Width Factor
preferences.description: Adjust wrap width for non-Latin scripts (e.g., Greek, CJK etc). Lower value = shorter lines. Recommended range: [0.2 - 1.8]

validation.error_message: Invalid number format. Please enter a positive value like 0.96 or 1.10

preferences.name: Enable Q&A Logging
preferences.description: Save queries and answers to a log file?

preferences.name: Show 'Logged' Line
preferences.description: Show confirmation below response when logged (if logging enabled).

validation.error_message: Invalid path. Use absolute path or ~ for home.

preferences.name: Enable Debug Mode
preferences.description: Show detailed errors and API info in Ulauncher/logs.
